description:
Give Mikasa a new outfit.
Add a little flavor to the battlefield by wearing a costume with a Summer motif.

How to use

You can access the new costume by either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select the character.
Change into the new costume by pressing the B button when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character in the Daily Life section.
Change into the new costume by pressing the A button when you are near the character.
name: Mikasa Costume "Summer Festival"
